explanation: [0-0] On a wooden boardwalk by the river in a park, three young boys are sitting near the water's edge. The boys on the left and in the middle are shirtless, while the boy on the right is wearing a blue short-sleeved shirt. The first boy on the left has a black laptop on his lap, and all three of them are looking at it. To the left of the frame, a young man in a red shirt is standing. He is wearing black sunglasses and holding a stick in his right hand. A red warning sign stands beside the boardwalk. In the distance, other people can be seen standing on the bridge, with tall buildings and green trees in the background.

[0-3] The man in the red shirt then feels his way slowly to the right. The little boy with the computer sees the man approaching and loosens his grip, causing the laptop to fall into the river. The boy then quickly gets up and pushes the man in the red shirt, who falls to the ground, dropping the stick he was holding into the river.
